name: Mere Christianity
reason: This book will help me deepen my faith and understanding of Christianity from C.S. Lewis' perspective.

name: Show Your Work
reason: This book will inspire me to confidently share my creative journey with others.

name: Seeking Allah, Finding Jesus
reason: This book will give me deeper insights into interfaith conversations and strengthen my spiritual growth.

name: A Voice in the Wind
reason: I'd love to read this inspiring story by Francine Rivers to grow my faith and imagination.

name: Pack of Stickers
reason: Fun stickers to decorate my books, laptop, and other personal items.

name: Any Fictional book
reason: I love getting lost in fictional worlds—books are my escape.

name: Notebooks
reason: These notebooks are perfect for jotting down ideas and staying organized.

name: Converse Shoes
reason: I need a pair of durable and stylish shoes for everyday wear. Converse matches my style and lasts long.

name: New Balance
reason: Comfortable sneakers for daily wear, walking, and staying active.

name: Black Low-Sole Loafers
reason: Classic shoes that go well with formal and casual outfits, stylish yet simple.

name: Adidas Sambas
reason: A classic sneaker that's stylish and versatile, perfect for casual and sporty outfits.

name: Nike Dunks
reason: Trendy and comfortable sneakers I'd love to wear for everyday style and confidence.

name: Covered Boots
reason: Strong, stylish boots to wear during rainy weather and outdoor activities.

name: A Monitor
reason: A bigger screen will help me multitask and work on projects more comfortably, especially coding and design.

name: Headsets
reason: Good headphones will help me enjoy music, block out noise, and focus better while working.

name: Earbuds
reason: These earbuds are perfect for listening to music and podcasts on the go.

name: Wireless Mics
reason: Perfect for recording, making content, and speaking clearly without dealing with cables.

name: Photochromic Glasses
reason: These adapt to sunlight and protect my eyes, which would be super helpful!

name: Soundcore Neck Earpiece
reason: These earbuds are perfect for listening to music and podcasts on the go.

name: Portable Sewing Machine
reason: I want to learn tailoring and be able to make and adjust clothes by myself.

name: Polaroid Camera
reason: I want to capture memories instantly and create a collection of printed photos to keep and share.

name: Mini Printer
reason: I want to print small photos and notes to keep memories and decorate my journals.

name: Pack of Crochet Yarn
reason: I want to learn crochet and make creative, handmade items for myself and friends.

name: Rubik's Cube
reason: It's fun, and I want to learn how to solve it properly.

name: Messenger Bag
reason: A sleek bag to carry my essentials daily, both for school and casual outings.

name: Aso Oke Pants
reason: Cultural and stylish pants that connect me with tradition while still looking modern.

name: Jerseys
reason: I love collecting jerseys from different teams and players!

name: Cute Sweaters
reason: They're cozy and stylish—perfect for colder seasons.

name: Zipup Jacket
reason: It's trendy and fits my style perfectly for fall weather.

name: Analog Watch
reason: An analog watch keeps me disciplined with time and adds a touch of class to my outfits.

name: Jewelry
reason: Simple gold jewelry to add elegance and confidence to my style.

name: Beaded Jewelry
reason: Beaded jewelry gives me a unique, creative look and is perfect for casual wear.

name: Phone Charm
reason: Phone charms add a personal touch to my device and make it easier to find in my bag!

name: Biker Shades
reason: Stylish and practical, these shades are great for sunny days.

name: Bagonetta Glasses
reason: These glasses are stylish and perfect for completing my fall outfits.

name: Salicylic Acid
reason: For skincare to help me maintain a clear and healthy face.

name: Niacinamide
reason: This helps with my skin texture and acne marks. I've been wanting to include this in my routine for better skin health.

name: Olbolla Lipgloss
reason: This gloss is known for being super hydrating and aesthetic.
